headline: Meta Broadens AI Chip Supply While Targeting Scam Advertisers Worldwide
summary: Meta Platforms (NasdaqGS:META) has signed multi billion dollar AI chip partnerships with AMD and Google, expanding and diversifying its AI infrastructure supply. The company is shifting toward a multi supplier AI hardware model to support its large scale AI ambitions across its platforms and services. In parallel, Meta is pursuing legal action against scam advertisers globally that use its platforms for fraudulent activity, aiming to address user safety and trust concerns. For you as an...

headline: AMD Ties Meta And Nutanix Deals To Long Term AI Growth Narrative
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (NasdaqGS:AMD) has agreed to supply Meta Platforms with up to 6 gigawatts of custom AI chips under a multi-year, multi-billion-dollar deal. The agreement includes performance based equity warrants that could give Meta a meaningful ownership stake in AMD if certain targets are met. AMD also announced a new partnership with Nutanix to build open, enterprise focused AI infrastructure platforms. NasdaqGS:AMD is drawing fresh attention as it links its future more tightly...

headline: Vistra Corp. (VST): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Vistra Corp. on r/Valueinvesting by Vig_Newtons. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on VST. Vistra Corp.’s share was trading at $171.49 as of February 16th. VST’s trailing and forward P/E were 61.69 and 17.92 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Vistra Corp. (VST) has emerged as a differentiated player within the utility landscape, particularly when compared to larger XLU constituents such as NextEra Energy and Constellation […]

headline: Oklo Meta Deal And Radioisotopes Open New Paths To Cash Flow
summary: Oklo (NYSE:OKLO) announced new customer agreements totalling about 14 GW of capacity, including a 1.2 GW advanced nuclear campus for Meta Platforms. The company disclosed a technology partnership with Siemens Energy focused on its Aurora power conversion system. Oklo also expanded into radioisotopes through its Atomic Alchemy subsidiary, aiming to add another business line alongside power generation. Oklo is working on compact advanced nuclear reactors aimed at supplying reliable, long...

headline: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Pushes Back On Fears Surrounding Big Tech's $700 Billion CapEx Surge: 'Compute Equals Revenues' In The New AI World
summary: On Wednesday, Nvidia Corp (NASDAQ:NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang said he remains "confident" that Big Tech's massive AI infrastructure spending will continue. headline: Meta, YouTube, TikTok And Others Bag A Win As Federal Court Stops Virginia's Under-16 Social Media Restrictions Backed By 30 States
summary: A federal judge in Virginia temporarily blocked the state's one-hour daily social media limit for minors under 16, siding with tech companies including Meta and YouTube in a lawsuit brought by NetChoice, ruling the law likely violates First Amendment protections.
